scripts.backup-db-dev: export PGPASSWORD='thisiswherewefight' && pg_dump -h 127.0.0.1 -d helia -U developer -f ../devschema.sql -s && pg_dump -h 127.0.0.1 -d helia -U developer -f ../devdb.sql
scripts.restore-db-dev: export PGPASSWORD='thisiswherewefight' && echo 'drop owned by developer;' | psql -h 127.0.0.1 -d helia -U developer && psql -h 127.0.0.1 -d helia -U developer < ../devdb.sql
scripts.backup-db-alpha: export PGPASSWORD='Tgbe{67h?3f4\~~' && export PGSSLMODE='require' && pg_dump -h helia-alpha.postgres.database.azure.com -d helia -U heliaagent@helia-alpha -f ../alphaschema.sql -s && pg_dump -h helia-alpha.postgres.database.azure.com -d helia -U heliaagent@helia-alpha -f ../alphadb.sql
scripts.restore-db-alpha: export PGPASSWORD='Tgbe{67h?3f4\~~' && export PGSSLMODE='require' && echo 'drop owned by heliaagent;' | psql -h helia-alpha.postgres.database.azure.com -d helia -U heliaagent@helia-alpha && psql -h helia-alpha.postgres.database.azure.com -d helia -U heliaagent@helia-alpha < ../alphadb.sql
